title: Dona Maria Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Italian, Buffet, Salad bar, Latin American, Argentinian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The evening buffet has many vegetarian dishes: lots of pasta, big salad bar, grilled vegetables, baked pumpkin and butternut squash with walnuts and olives, etc. Big selection of desserts (dairy) and lots of fruit. Vegans could negotiate with the manager for a discount.
